slides.title: Indian Geography
slides.content:
**Location:** South Asia
**Neighbors:** Pakistan, China, Nepal, Bhutan, Bangladesh, Myanmar
**Rivers:** Ganga, Yamuna, Brahmaputra
**Mountains:** Himalayas (highest)

slides.title: States & Capitals
slides.content:
**29 States + 7 UTs**
**Examples:**
- Maharashtra: Mumbai
- Delhi: New Delhi (UT)
- Karnataka: Bengaluru
- Tamil Nadu: Chennai
